title: Fillet steak with a chunky mushroom strogonoff sauce
ingredients: ['1 dash olive oil', '1 banana shallot, diced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 dash brandy', '1 handful chestnut mushrooms, thickly sliced', '2 pickled gherkins, medium sliced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 (225g/8oz) fillet steaks, at room temperature', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '200ml double cream', '1 sprig fresh parsley or chives, chopped']
